FuncDef: The restore startup checkpoint command configures a checkpoint for the next startup. The restore startup checkpoint command configures a checkpoint for the next startup. By default, if the system does not need to perform software rollback, you do not need to set the rollback point for the next use.

ParaDef.Info:
Checkpoint name.
The value is a string of 5 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To specify a checkpoint for the next startup in a software rollback scenario, run the restore startup checkpoint command.
